    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>for upgrading customers this fix script will add referece cascade rule - non to orig sys id reference in planned task</description>
        <name>Update CascadeRule In PlannedTask</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateReferenceCascadeRule('planned_task', 'orig_sys_id', 'none');

function updateReferenceCascadeRule(tableName, refColumn, cascadeRule){
	var gDict = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
	gDict.addQuery("name", tableName);
	gDict.addQuery("element", refColumn);
	gDict.query();
	if(gDict.next()){
		gDict.setValue("reference_cascade_rule", cascadeRule);
		gDict.update();
	}
}]]></script>
